page.title: 06HOUSES ON THE ESTATE 1
page.content: Most of the houses on the {Abercairney Estate}are more than a hundred years old. Although they were built at roughly the same time they look very different. One of the houses was a cottage and had only 1 level, the other house was built onto the Estate stables. The stables and the houses were very large compared to the cottage. The house that I visited in the stables had 2 levels. Both the houses have been modernised in the past but no extentions have been added as the houses don't belong to the family, but to the{ Estate. }The men of the families are both estate workers, so the houses are included in the jobs.
